Cyber Claw:









Still on her chest, Cyber Claw growled at Carnage, but somewhere inside her 
thought that her fall as somewhat funny. "Shut up," she said to Carnage, but 
managed a weak grin, with her nose to the floor.

She looked around the interior of the ship, as Carnage noticed the ship's 
origin. She had no idea what this place was, and she really didn't care if 
it was the Maximal's ancestor's ship. She only cared about herself. That was 
the way things went.

She looked among the Maximals around her. "Primal," she said, in Dinobot's 
voice. "I must speak to Primal!" She pounded her forpaw against the floor.
